Package com.SuperheroSightings.springbootrestjdbctemplatemaven.dao

Class LocationDAOImpl

java.lang.Object
com.SuperheroSightings.springbootrestjdbctemplatemaven.dao.LocationDAOImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
LocationDAO
@Repository public class LocationDAOImpl extends Object implements LocationDAO
Implementation of the LocationDAO interface. This class provides CRUD operations for the Location entity using JDBC.
